Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a message posted on a fan page, which is not an official source of news.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Cartoon Network announced the reboot of "Ed, Edd n Eddy" based on a message from a fan page, without verifying the information from an official source.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided that the rumor of the reboot started with a Tumblr post and some users believed it to be true, indicating that the claim may not be accurate.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times because it mentions that the rumor was rebuffed by the voice actress of the show when it first circulated in 2017, suggesting that the claim may not be true.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of any exaggeration bias in the claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there was no official announcement from Cartoon Network regarding the reboot of "Ed, Edd n Eddy," as confirmed by the voice actress of the show.
